positions.title: General Counsel
positions.location: United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
CPX is a cybersecurity service provider based in the UAE, part of the G42 group of companies. 
 Leads an international team of legal professionals responsible for all legal and regulatory matters
including corporate-commercial transactions, intellectual property and compliance.
 Successfully managed all legal aspects of four large M&A transactions.
 Sits on the Leadership Team and proactively provides legal advice to the shareholder, Board of
Directors, Chief Executive Officer and other senior leaders.
 Manages all patent/trademark assets and regulatory licenses and chairs cross-functional
intellectual property and export control committees.
 Coaches and trains legal team members to ensure they deliver high quality legal services to all
business units.

positions.title: Strategic Business Manager (G42)
positions.description:
CPX, a G42 company, is in it's transformative journey to be the region's trusted Cybersecurity leader.

Microsoft's $1.5B investment across G42 ecosystem is a testimonial to this strategic vision.


- Managing strategic accounts across G42 entities

- Driving growth by nurturing and generating businesses across all internal G42 entities and external key accounts 

- Closely working with industry experts and partners from various cyber domains to provide highest quality of service

Leveraging UAE market experience to expand business in AI, cybersecurity, cloud, health tech, and data analytics

- Strengthening regional trust and delivering long-term business impact

positions.title: Executive Director - Cyber Consulting Services
positions.location: Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description: Leading the Cybersecurity Consulting business, responsible for driving business growth through strategic account planning and revenue expansion. Managing and guiding multiple teams to deliver comprehensive security solutions that protect organizations from emerging cyber threats. Overseeing the development and implementation of robust cybersecurity frameworks, conducting risk assessments, and advising clients on best practices to enhance their security posture. Focused on helping businesses navigate the evolving cybersecurity landscape, ensuring the protection of critical assets, and expanding the CPXs presence in the cybersecurity market.

positions.title: Senior Specialist Digital Marketing
positions.location: Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
Social Media Lead:
Lead and manage the social media and content calendars, ensuring consistent, high-quality content delivery across all social  channels.

Produce and support video and podcast content, while planning and hosting internal and external webinars to boost brand visibility and engagement.

Conduct internal training sessions for stakeholders on SEO, blog writing, and digital marketing best practices, enabling the creation of impactful thought leadership content.

Marketing Automation:
Design & implement strategic customer journeys, using segmentation, email marketing, campaign logic, and performance insights to enhance lead nurturing and conversion on Hubspot.

Create real-time performance dashboards and generate detailed monthly reports on social media and campaign KPIs to inform stakeholders and guide data-driven decisions.

Work closely with the C-suite, providing actionable insights and analytics to shape future digital strategies and elevate marketing impact

Collaborate with content and design teams to ensure consistent brand messaging and audience engagement.

Leverage tools like Sprinklr, Sprout social, Hubspot

Ad campaigns:
Lead awareness and acquisition strategies through digital campaigns and working closely with agencies to maximize performance and ROI.

Plan and execute digital campaigns, creating optimized web and landing pages, running ABM initiatives, and supporting key events like GITEX, GISEC, Webinars, Partner Programs, Customer meet-ups and Cyber Security workshops and conferences.

Collaborate with agencies to optimize campaign performance, improve ROI & refine targeting.

Website Management:
Manage website development and maintenance, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly digital experience through continuous UX/UI improvements.

Coordinate with internal stakeholders to keep website content current and aligned with evolving business goals.

Lead the design and development of internal portals

positions.title: Business Operations Manager | Relocation back to the UAE

multiLocaleTitle.de_DE: Business Operations Manager | Relocation back to the UAE

positions.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
Collaborate with our COO and CPX leadership to drive our business operations by aligning and driving our geo expansion goals, increase our strategic partnerships and streamlining our internal operations.

	Led post-acquisition integration and act as a key liaison to facilitate knowledge transfer, align workflows, and accelerate team cohesion for seamless operational continuity.

	Led vendor discussions to drive adoption of AI-powered tools, enabling our company to scale internal operations and deliver greater business impact to our clients.

	Advise leadership on investment priorities for internal operations, focusing on data-driven solutions that optimize performance and drive long-term efficiency.

	Engage key clients through interactive workshops, capturing actionable insights that directly shape improvements in service delivery and elevate customer satisfaction.

positions.title: Senior Lead Project Manager
positions.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
Spearheaded full-spectrum project management, ensuring seamless execution from inception to deployment across key initiatives.

Established and refined project management methodologies, tools and best practices to enhance organizational capabilities.

Directed daily project operations, resource allocation, and led project management team meetings.

Provided detailed progress reports to leadership, highlighting milestones, deliverables and critical project parameters.

Vigilantly managed project scope, overseeing change processes, and upheld rigorous quality control standards.

Acted as a key player in conflict resolution, including negotiation, arbitration and safeguarding project interests.

Orchestrated project components, including planning, vendor management, communication, budgeting and risk management.

Monitored and steered project outcomes, addressing issues, conflicts, dependencies and ensuring on-track deliverable completion.

positions.title: Lead Consultant - Cyber Consulting Services
positions.location: United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
https://www.g42.ai/companies/cpx 

Leading end-to-end delivery of cybersecurity and AI security consulting engagements, covering Cyber GRC, AI Governance, and enterprise security advisory for public- and private-sector clients.

Owning execution quality, delivery timelines, and client outcomes across multiple concurrent engagements, ensuring consistency, regulatory alignment, and high stakeholder confidence.

Acting as day-to-day engagement lead, coordinating across technical specialists, consultants, and client stakeholders to translate risk requirements into execution-ready programs.

Mentoring and reviewing work of junior consultants, improving delivery consistency and reducing rework across engagements.

Contributing to client satisfaction and account retention through structured delivery, clear executive communication, and predictable outcomes.

positions.location: Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
About CPX:
CPX is a cybersecurity company that provides end-to-end cyber and physical security solutions and services for businesses and governments. As a G42 company, CPX offers services such as cyber consulting, security solutions delivery, and OT (Operational Technology) cybersecurity. They focus on protecting organizations by helping them assess risks, protect assets, and ensure digital resilience, with a significant presence in the UAE.
cpx.net

positions.title: Executive Director, Commercial
positions.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
positions.description:
Seasoned and results-driven commercial leader with over two decades of experience spanning Cybersecurity, IT Managed Services, Data Centers, Applications Development, and BPO. Currently serving as Executive Director - Commercial at a leading end-to-end cybersecurity organization in Abu Dhabi, I specialize in driving high-impact commercial strategies, managing complex multi-million dollar deals, and delivering sustainable business growth.
Expert in end-to-end opportunity management, solutions consulting, and commercial strategy development, I bring a proven ability to conceptualize and execute winning value propositions that align with both client and supplier objectives. My approach is rooted in building long-term partnerships, leveraging deep industry relationships, and crafting best-in-class commercial frameworks that deliver measurable results.
A strong communicator and authentic leader, I am passionate about empowering high-performing teams. Known for my genuine people management skills, I foster collaborative environments that drive innovation, accountability, and excellence across cross-functional teams.
